casebody.data:
B. LOWERY v. H. C. McLEOD, Warden, Oklahoma State Penitentiary. No. 5518. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Jan. 4, 1957. Eugene D. Lorig, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Mac Q. Williamson, Atty. Gen., and Lewis A. Wallace, Asst. Atty. Gen., State of Oklahoma, for appellee.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and HUXMAN and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

Affirmed without written opinion.
